Sentencas: Electrochemical performance and feasibility of proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) using methane (CH4) fuel were investigated.
Titulo: Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Yttrium-Doped Barium Zirconate for Direct Methane Operation

Sentencas: At high fuel utilization, higher protonic transport number of electrolytes enables higher open-circuit voltage (OCV) when hydrogen (H-2) is the fuel.
Titulo: Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Yttrium-Doped Barium Zirconate for Direct Methane Operation

Sentencas: In contrast, a high oxide ionic transport number is needed when CH4 is the fuel.
Titulo: Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Yttrium-Doped Barium Zirconate for Direct Methane Operation

Sentencas: Conductivities of each charge carrier of an yttrium-doped barium zirconate (BZY) electrolyte were therefore estimated by measuring the OCV under various partial pressures.
Titulo: Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Yttrium-Doped Barium Zirconate for Direct Methane Operation

Sentencas: A dense BZY electrolyte was obtained by the addition of 0.6 mol% nickel (Ni).
Titulo: Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Yttrium-Doped Barium Zirconate for Direct Methane Operation

Sentencas: This electrolyte exhibited protonic- and oxide ionic-mixed conductivity; in particular, these conductivities were similar to each other at 800-900 degrees C, indicating high efficiency.
Titulo: Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Yttrium-Doped Barium Zirconate for Direct Methane Operation

Sentencas: A Ni/BZY anode enabled stable operation of a proton-conducting SOFC using 3% humidified CH4 fuel.
Titulo: Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Yttrium-Doped Barium Zirconate for Direct Methane Operation

Sentencas: The maximum power density of this SOFC was 2.35 mW cm(-2) at 900 degrees C and 1.69 mW cm(-2) at 800 degrees C, which were higher than that using a platinum anode.
Titulo: Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Yttrium-Doped Barium Zirconate for Direct Methane Operation

Sentencas: The activation energy for electrode polarization of the Ni/BZY anode using 3% humidified CH4 fuel was similar to that using 3% humidified H-2 fuel, indicating that H-2 via decomposition of CH4 was the main reactant on the Ni/BZY anode.
Titulo: Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Yttrium-Doped Barium Zirconate for Direct Methane Operation
Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Yttrium-Doped Barium Zirconate for Direct Methane Operation
Proton-Conducting Solid Oxide Fuel Cells with Yttrium-Doped Barium Zirconate for Direct Methane Operation
